action.action-desc: Mr. Barrett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to include licensed hearing aid specialists under the Veterans Community Care Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Hearing Health Expansion Act.

section.header: Inclusion of licensed hearing aid specialists in Veterans Community Care Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 1703(c) of title 38, United States Code, is amended byâ€”

paragraph.text: redesignating paragraphs (2) through (5) as paragraphs (3) through (6), respectively; and
by inserting after paragraph (1) the following new paragraph:
A hearing aid specialist licensed to furnish medical services in the State in which such hearing aid specialist is located.
